attributes.action: Change the Saudi governments decision to only allow under 65's for Hajj 2022.
attributes.additional_details:
People have waited their entire lives to go on this pilgrimage. Many have booked in early 2020 but have been unable to go because of the covid19 cancellations. 

For the majority of citizens in the UK 65 is a fit and healthy age and should not be a reason to be prejudiced against fulfilling a once in a lifetime opportunity.
attributes.background: Delegate with Saudi Arabia to scrap this age limit or at least push it to 75.

rejection.details: This is an internal matter for the Saudi Arabian Government, and not something the UK Government or House of Commons are directly responsible for.
